hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #3# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Deku Nut Capacity#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Hookshot#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Compass Room Side Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.
